subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Left-Handedness
lead_paragraph: Five of 32 men and women singles players remaining at Wimbledon are left-handed, a testament to how hard it is for right-handed players to prepare for them.
snippet: Five of 32 men and women singles players remaining at Wimbledon are left-handed, a testament to how hard it is for right-handed players to prepare for them.
